overview: The young lads Rafael Lords and Armond Rizzo are Raw & Ready when their older, dominant, and aggressive mentor Sean Duran presents himself to teach them what it means to be a man. And once he's done having his way with them, he invites his buddies Pedro Andreas and Matt Stevens over. Why, you ask? So Sean can put Armond and Rafael to the test and see if they've learned what he taught. Meanwhile, Sergeant Miles returns to take the bare cock of Bryce Evans. And Rikk York shares his load with Logan Stone. Are you as Raw & Ready as the men of Lucas Entertainment are?
title: Raw & Ready
